data.actual_result: Discord throws a Uncaught (in promise) DOMException error in the console
data.expected_result: No error is produced in the console
data.short_description: Passing your mouse quickly over a gif (Tested with Imgur, Tenor, Giphy) throws a Uncaught (in promise) DOMException error in the console
data.steps_to_repro: - Disable auto play gifs in User Settings > Text & Images - Post a gif from Imgur, Tenor, or Giphy - Open your console - Switch to another server or channel - Switch back to the channel and quickly pass your mouse over the gif (You will have to switch to another channel/server & back if you fail the first attempt)
